segments.text: Over in the corner, the children are up to something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is precariously balanced on a wobbly two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the open cabinet, right for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see the "COOKIE JAR" label; it's filled to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister stands below him, hand outstretched expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me smile to see their quiet, coordinated mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks like it could tip backward any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart jumps a little as it sways beneath his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's ready to catch the plate of cookies, just like a seasoned accomplice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their sweet prize, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a clever, yet risky, plan they've concocted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before anyone falls.
segments.speaker: PAR
